title: The Neighbors Are Scaring My Wolf
description: Jack Douglas is a kook of the TV comic world who reports his surprise and distress in adjusting to "Old New Litchridge" after living in Manhattan's canyons. The wolf of title is a family pet who is intimidated by the wild behavior of the Douglas neighbors.Around the wolf problem Douglas scatters the usual suburban ones of drunken neighbors, capitalist plumbers, quaint local politicians, quaint storekeepers, quaint architecture, and brash children
author: Jack Douglas
